nodes.title: Net Zero Energy Building
nodes.description: The Net Zero Energy Buildings (NZEB) platform is a one-stop shop to learn about NZEB fundamentals, build alliances with professionals and organizations, find inspiration from case studies, explore the latest technology/policies/ideas and everything NZEB. India emerges as a global leader for energy efficiency and renewable energy integration in buildings, with a thriving market and conducive policy environment for NZEBs.

nodes.title: Laser Turret
nodes.description: Advanced defense system with face and position detection

nodes.title: Rubiks Cube Solver
nodes.description: It solves for any colour pattern. It has an arm and a rotating base.The mechanical arm flips the cube

nodes.title: Quadcopter
nodes.description: Flying and surveillance done. Concepts of aerodynamic stability incorporated. Speed can be altered to through phone

nodes.title: Line Following and Obstacle Detection Robot
nodes.description: Obstacle Avoiding Robot, Automatically sense the obstacle . Robot navigates in unknown environment by avoiding collisions.

nodes.title: Piezoelectric Shoes
nodes.description: A piezoelectric generator is placed in the shoe. The power that is generated by piezoelectric generator when a person walks is transferred to the device by using a mid-range wireless power transfer (WPT) which is a Resonance coupling technique

nodes.title: Material Optimization of Spur Gear Tooth

sig_details.name: Torsion
sig_details.description: Torsion SIG brings together people interested in Mechanical, Civil, Chemical and Material Sciences.
